name: canine
description: Canine is a tool for managing dog data including health records, medical history, and microchip info. It provides a simple UI for pet owners or veterinarians and supports self-hosting to keep sensitive data private.
features: Pet Health Records: Manage dog health records and medical history. Complete pet care.
Medical Tracking: Track vaccinations, medications, and vet visits. Never miss appointments.
Microchip Info: Store microchip and identification details. Important records safe.
Simple Interface: Easy-to-use UI for pet owners and vets. User-friendly.
Self-Hosted: Keep sensitive pet data completely private. Data security.
Veterinary Tool: Useful for both pet owners and veterinarians. Professional solution.
